page.title: 15Market Gardening - two
page.content: Some crops are hydroponically grown (which is water with the correct amount of fertilizer circulated in polythene channels). Many plants are grown in small blocks of rockwool. Peat blocks are also used, and there is very little cultivating. The glass houses are now heated by gas. Some growers produce their own seed, but some is purchased from Holland. The peat is purchased from Russia.Much of the equipment comes from Holland,glass is from Russia or East Germany. Evesham has many large transport firms and some have insulated wagons and can reach any part of Britain by the next morning. Hills nursery on the A44 road sells bedding plants, shrubs and trees. They are open to the public and tourists but most customers are local.
